headline: Citi is Bullish on Newmont Corporation (NEM)
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM) is among the 15 Best Performing Silver Stocks to Buy. According to TheFly, Citi lifted Newmont Corporation (NYSE:NEM)’s price goal from $104 to $118 and kept its Buy rating on January 12.
